desc_e: Hong Kong Monthly Digest of Statistics

desc_c: 表10.1：進出香港的飛機、船隻、車輛及火車
desc_e: Table 10.1 : Inward and outward movements of aircraft, vessels, motor vehicles and trains

desc_c: 進出香港的飛機[架次]、船隻[船次]、車輛[架次]及火車[班次]
desc_e: Inward and outward movements of aircraft, vessels, motor vehicles and trains [numbers]

desc_c: 進出香港的船隻[千淨噸位]
desc_e: Inward and outward movements of vessels [thousand NT]

desc_c: 內河船隻 (註釋 1) - 來往珠江口岸 (澳門除外) 的客船
desc_e: River vessels (note 1) - Passenger vessels to/from Pearl River ports (other than Macao)

desc_c: 內河船隻 (註釋 1) - 來往澳門的客船
desc_e: River vessels (note 1) - Passenger vessels to/from Macao

desc_c: 內河船隻 (註釋 1) - 貨船
車輛 [架次] (註釋 2) - 貨運車輛
車輛 [架次] (註釋 2) - 客運車輛
火車 - 客運火車 [班次] (註釋 3)
NT = 淨噸位 (以前稱為淨註冊噸位)
desc_e: NT = Net tonnage (previous known as net registered tonnage (NRT))

desc_c: (註釋 1) 由於不能準確地統計本地領牌遊樂船和漁船來往香港及內河航限內的船次，故這兩類船隻沒有包括在內河船隻統計範圍內。由2017年開始，內河客船包括在內河航限行駛的郵船。
desc_e: (note 1) As accurate number of trips of locally licensed pleasure vessels and fishing vessels plying between Hong Kong and the river trade limits is not available, these two categories of vessels are not included in the river vessel statistics.  As from 2017, river passenger vessels include cruises plying within the river trade limits.

desc_c: (註釋 2) 港珠澳大橋於2018年10月24日開始通車營運。由2018年10月開始，數字亦包括使用港珠澳大橋的車輛。
desc_e: (note 2) The Hong Kong-Zhuhai-Macao Bridge commenced operation on 24 October 2018.  Figures as from October 2018 also include those vehicles using the Hong Kong-Zhuhai-Macao Bridge.

desc_c: (註釋 3) 高速鐵路 (香港段) 於2018年9月23日開始投入服務。由2018年9月開始，數字除包括城際直通車服務外，亦包括高速鐵路 (香港段) 服務。
desc_e: (note 3) The High Speed Rail (Hong Kong Section) commenced service on 23 September 2018.  Figures as from September 2018 also include the High Speed Rail (Hong Kong Section) service, in addition to the Intercity Through Train service.

desc_c: 民航處；香港海關；海事處；香港鐵路有限公司
desc_e: Civil Aviation Department; Customs and Excise Department; Marine Department; MTR Corporation Limited

desc_e: (note 1) The Hong Kong-Zhuhai-Macao Bridge commenced operation on 24 October 2018.  The road cargo figures as from October 2018 include those of the Hong Kong-Zhuhai-Macao Bridge.

專營巴士 - 新大嶼山巴士
鐵路 - 港鐵線路 (註釋 2)
鐵路 - 香港電車 (註釋 3)
公共小巴 - 專線小巴
公共小巴 - 紅色小巴
渡輪 (註釋 4) - 新世界第一渡輪
渡輪 (註釋 4) - 天星小輪
渡輪 (註釋 4) - 其他持牌渡輪
(註釋 1) 居民巴士服務是由或代任何住宅發展的管理機構、住客或擁有人提供，以運載乘客往返該住宅發展的服務。居民巴士服務是非專營公共巴士服務的其中一種。非專營公共巴士亦提供遊覽服務、酒店服務、學生服務、僱員服務、國際乘客服務及合約式出租服務，但因沒有相關資料，這些服務的乘客人次數字未能提供。
desc_e: (note 1) Residents' services are services provided by or on behalf of the management, residents or owners of any residential development for the carriage of passengers to or from the residential development.  Residents' services are a type of non-franchised public bus services.  Non-franchised public buses also provide tour service, hotel service, student service, employees' service, international passenger service and contract hire service.  However, since relevant data are not available, the patronage figures for these services cannot be provided.

desc_c: (註釋 2) 港鐵線路包括觀塘、荃灣、港島、東涌、迪士尼、將軍澳、東鐵、西鐵、馬鞍山、南港島線、城際客運及高速鐵路（香港段）。
desc_e: (note 2) MTR Lines include Kwun Tong, Tsuen Wan, Island, Tung Chung, Disneyland Resort, Tseung Kwan O, East Rail, West Rail, Ma On Shan, South Island Lines, Intercity Through Train and the High Speed Rail (Hong Kong Section).

desc_c: (註釋 3) 不包括免費乘搭日的乘客及在選定日期可免費乘坐電車的特定乘客。
desc_e: (note 3) Excluding passengers on free ride days and specific groups of passengers enjoying free rides on selected days.

desc_c: (註釋 4) 「渡輪」包括專營及持牌渡輪服務，但不包括街渡。
desc_e: (note 4) "Ferries" includes franchised and licensed services but excludes kaitos.

desc_e: Figures for "New registration" before February 2019 refer to new registration of brand new vehicles.  As from February 2019, the figures refer to new registration of all vehicles.

desc_c: 車輛領牌及登記總數指期末數字，新登記指該期間所登記的車輛數字。
desc_e: Total vehicles licensed and registered figures refer to end of period position whereas new registration figures refer to registrations during the period.

desc_c: (註釋 2) 包括城巴專營一及專營二的公共巴士。
desc_e: (note 2) Including public buses of Citybus Franchise 1 and 2.

desc_c: (註釋 3) 指可以提供遊覽服務、酒店服務、學生服務、僱員服務、國際乘客服務、居民服務、複合交通服務及／或合約式出租服務的非專營公共巴士。
desc_e: (note 3) Referring to non-franchised public buses which can provide tour service, hotel service, student service, employees' service, international passenger service, residents' service, multiple transport service and/or contract hire service.

desc_c: (註釋 2) 包括以公海為目的地的郵船旅客。

表10.14：按類別劃分的香港酒店及賓館統計數字
desc_e: Table 10.14 : Hotel and guesthouse statistics of Hong Kong by category

desc_c: (註釋 1) 持牌酒店及賓館數字以民政事務總署牌照事務處為依據。數字為期末數字。
desc_e: (note 1) Number of licensed hotels and guesthouses are obtained from the Office of the Licensing Authority, Home Affairs Department.  Figures are as at end of the period.

desc_c: (註釋 2) 房間入住率乃根據酒店及賓館回應香港旅遊發展局每月進行的「酒店入住率問卷調查」所提供的資料而編製。
desc_e: (note 2) Room occupancy rate is compiled based on data reported by those hotels and guesthouses which responded to the Hong Kong Tourism Board's monthly Hotel Room Occupancy Survey.

desc_c: (註釋 3) 賓館包括旅客賓館及本地人士賓館。
desc_e: (note 3) Guesthouses include tourist guesthouses and local people guesthouses.

desc_e: Outward external telephone traffic volume (note 1) [thousand minutes]

desc_c: 交換機有效負載量 (註釋 2) [以千條線路計]
圖文傳真線路 (註釋 2) [以千條計]
公共無線電傳呼接收器 (註釋 2)
電話線路 (註釋 2) (註釋 4) [以千條計]
公共流動服務用戶數目 (註釋 2) (註釋 5)
公共流動服務用戶數目  (註釋 2) (不包括預付智能卡)
desc_e: No. of public mobile subscriptions (note 2) (excluding pre-paid SIM cards)

desc_c: 第2.5代／3代／4代公共流動服務用戶數目 (註釋 2) (註釋 6)
每個第2.5代／3代／4代用戶的平均流動數據通訊量 [以兆字節計]
desc_e: Average volume of mobile data usage per 2.5G/3G/4G  subscriptions [megabytes]

desc_c: 每名人口的平均流動數據通訊量 [以兆字節計]
desc_e: Average volume of mobile data usage per capita [megabytes]

desc_c: 商業 - 專用自動電話交換 (註釋 1)
(註釋 2) 年底或月底數字。流動服務用戶包括傳統流動話音及／或數據客戶和機器類連線之用戶。
desc_e: (note 2) End-of-period figures. Mobile subscriptions include conventional mobile voice and/or data subscriptions by customers and subscriptions for machine type connections.

desc_c: (註釋 3) 由2017年起，對外電話通訊量由按季改為按年提供。
desc_e: (note 3) Starting from 2017, the provision of external telephone traffic was changed from quarterly to yearly basis.

desc_c: (註釋 4) 包括直通內線式電話線、圖文傳真線、電文線路的直撥服務以及非傳統電話線（包括但不限於網際規約 (IP) 電話服務及無線固網電話服務）。
desc_e: (note 4) Include direct dialling in lines, facsimile lines, datel lines and non-exchange lines (include but are not limited to Internet Protocol (IP) telephony services and wireless fixed telephony services).

desc_c: (註釋 5) 數字包括預付智能卡。
(註釋 6)「2.5代／3代／4代用戶」 指（i）登記為2.5代／3代／4代用戶；（ii）利用2.5代／3代／4代服務；或（iii）曾使用2.5代／3代／4代頻率以接收公共流動服務的用戶。數字包括預付智能卡的用戶。
desc_e: (note 6) "2.5G/3G/4G subscriptions" refer to those mobile subscriptions that (i) are registered as 2.5G/3G/4G subscriptions; (ii) ride on 2.5G/3G/4G services; or (iii) have used 2.5G/3G/4G frequencies to receive the public mobile services.  The figures include subscriptions of pre-paid SIM cards.

desc_c: (註釋 7) 數字是指有關年度12月的數字。
desc_e: (note 7) Figures refer to December of the year.

desc_c: 通訊事務管理局辦公室

(註釋 1) 包括所有持牌獲准提供互聯網接駁服務的營辦商。數字為期末數字。
desc_e: (note 1) Including all licensees authorised to provide Internet access services.  Figures are as at end of the period.

desc_c: (註釋 2) 數字為根據互聯網服務供應商申報的估計數字，並不包括不屬於持牌互聯網服務供應商客戶的使用者。由2019年1月開始，統計數字以互聯網服務供應商提供的"接駁線"數目計算，而在此日期前的以"客戶戶口"數目計算。
desc_e: (note 2) Estimated figures are based on returns from the ISPs and do not include users who are not customers of the licensed ISPs. From January 2019 onwards, the statistics are counted in terms of the number of "access lines" provided by ISPs, while it was in terms of the number of "registered customer accounts" prior to that.

desc_c:
(註釋 3) 已登記線路是指由互聯網服務供應商以撥號或寬頻互聯網形式向客戶提供的接駁（包括免費的接駁線）。如互聯網服務供應商向同一客戶提供多條接駁線，統計數字會根據其向其客戶提供的接駁線數目作統計。相關接駁線如用作提供多於一項服務，亦只作一條接駁線計算。
在2019年1月之前，統計數字為已登記客戶戶口，即互聯網服務供應商的客戶戶口（包括免費的客戶戶口）。擁有超過一個客戶登入識別碼的登記客戶戶口只算作一個已登記的客戶戶口。已登記客戶戶口數字不包括只獲提供電郵地址的客戶戶口。數字為期末數字。
desc_e:
(note 3) Registered access lines refer to the dial-up or broadband connections of ISPs to individual end users (including those free-of-charge connections).  Where multiple access lines are provided to the same end user, the number of access lines is counted for the purpose of the statistics.  In case more than one service is offered under one access line, it is counted as one access line only.  
For the period prior to January 2019, the statistics represents the number of registered customer accounts which refer to the customer accounts of ISPs (including those free-of-charge customer accounts).  For a registered customer account which has more than one user login ID, it is counted as one registered customer account only.  Registered customer accounts do not include customer accounts which are provided with e-mail addresses only.  Figures are as at end of the period.

desc_c: (註釋 4) 寬頻互聯網接駁指利用導線解調器、異步傳輸模式 (ATM)、非對稱數碼用戶線路 (ADSL) 、數碼用戶線路 (DSL) 或其他技術而下載速度達每秒1兆比特或以上的服務。
desc_e: (note 4) Broadband Internet access refers to services with downloading speed of 1 Mbps or above using cable modem, ATM (asynchronous transfer mode), ADSL (asymmetric digital subscriber line), DSL (digital subscriber line) or other technologies.

desc_c: (註釋 5) 數字不包括透過私人租用線路接駁及使用寬頻服務的客戶。
desc_e: (note 5) Figures do not include customer access via leased circuits and broadband services.

desc_c: (註釋 6) 寬頻是指以每秒1兆比特或以上的速度傳送數據的容量。
desc_e: (note 6) Broadband means the capacity to transmit data at the rate of 1 Mbps or above.

desc_c: 通訊事務管理局辦公室
寄往香港以外地方的物品
desc_e: Articles posted to places outside Hong Kong

desc_c: 本地派遞的從外地寄出物品
desc_e: Articles from outside Hong Kong for local delivery

desc_c: 寄往香港以外地方的包裹
desc_e: Parcels posted to places outside Hong Kong

desc_c: 本地派遞的從外地的包裹
desc_e: Parcels from outside Hong Kong for local delivery
